Title: The Gone Dead Train
Plot: A series of indeterminate deaths test the deductive powers of the CSI team, who fear that a public health emergency may be in the offing. Meanwhile, a friendly rivalry over who will win an upcoming bikini contest takes a deadly turn...
GuestStars: David Berman, Liz Vassey, Jere Burns, Alex Carter, Michele Greene, Sam Horrigan, Cristin Michele, Danielle Nicolet, Stacey Oristano, Ray Porter, Rey Valentin
